scripts.dep: composer update && composer install && npm install
scripts.cache: docker-compose run workspace php artisan config:clear
scripts.migrate: docker-compose run workspace php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
scripts.passport: docker-compose run workspace php artisan passport:install
scripts.larkey: docker-compose run workspace composer run-script post-create-project-cmd
scripts.idehelper: docker-compose run workspace php artisan ide-helper:generate && docker-compose run workspace php artisan ide-helper:models && docker-compose run workspace php artisan ide-helper:meta
